definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke

sentences.english: The tranquil sunny haze, the clinging smoke, the vapor.
sentences.chinese: 那寧靜的彩霞，繚繞的煙靄和水霧。

sentences.english: Allson Jacobel: A misty kayak adventure on Diamond lake in Wisconsin.
sentences.chinese: 威斯康星州，鑽石湖，行駛在煙靄中的皮筏。

sentences.english: Moon moon shop mist, warm heart.
sentences.chinese: 朗月鋪煙靄，秋月融融暖心間。

sentences.english: In the world of mortals, the number of Penglai news, empty back in succession, the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 紅塵中，多少蓬萊舊事，空回首，煙靄紛紛。
